# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $10000. To ensure we're on the same page about its potential impact, I propose a starting price of $25000. This reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the strategic benefits it could bring to your company. I look forward to discussing this further with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $25,000.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $25,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000

You chose to make a counteroffer to Alice.

Send your counteroffer to Alice.
